title: 76ers Plan to Build a New Arena with Private Funds (Podcast)
itunes:title: 76ers Plan to Build a New Arena with Private Funds (Podcast)
description:
Hosts Scarlet Fu and Damian Sassower bring in Bloomberg Markets Editor Michael Marois to discuss the NBA's Philadelphia 76ers plan to build a brand new arena in downtown Philly using private money instead of taxpayer dollars.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
